headline: Blueprint Technologies Recognized in Seven 2025 Gartner® Hype Cycle™ Reports for Role in Augmented FinOps
summary: Blueprint Technologies, a leader in data intelligence and cloud cost optimization, announced its recognition as a Sample Vendor in seven of Gartner's 2025 Hype Cycle™ reports. The company was acknowledged under the emerging category of Augmented FinOps, which Gartner identifies as a transformational technology that uses AI/ML to automate cloud financial operations and align spending with business outcomes.

headline: 1 Reason to Sell IT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of Gartner would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 34.3% and now trades at $353.20. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
